alert.note: Alert for Central Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Calhoun, southwestern Clarendon and eastern Orangeburg Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brookdale, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, Holly Hill, Summerton, Bowman, Elloree, Santee State Park, Claflin College, South Carolina State University, Orangeburg County Airport, Edisto Gardens, Santee, Cameron, Eutawville, Rowesville, Vance, Cordova, Poplar Creek Landing, Stumphole Landing, and Eautaw Springs. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 145 and 169. Interstate 95 between mile markers 85 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
